name: Astray From Shore
description:
Underwater Platformer

A game where you play as a man who put on his diver equipment while his ship was sinking. You have to find a way through the ocean floor and caves to get back to the surface.

Controls:

Movement: A/D  /  D-Pad left/Right

Jump:          Space/ A (controller)

Thanks to all my Teachers from the HTK Academy and their patience.

Thanks for the help i got from my classmates along the way:

Soby : Art

Sp1tF1re : Programming

K4YTO : Compiling 

And Soby, Joco and DoughAcquired for Emotional support
